channel.title: Comments on: Using SSIS to import a directory of images
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.content:encoded:
Hey Ted, I could not get this to work because I could not get the SQL Command Variable figured out. It seems like a much more elegant solution than what I ended up using and would love to know how to get it working.

Amy, you can set the variable by clicking on the view system variables icon in the upper left corner of the variables window.

item.title: By: Amy
item.dc:creator: Amy
item.content:encoded:
What do you set the property to for the Expression in the Create Archive Folder Task
Also
Where do you set this option (Last step in this package)
‘Set the DelayValidation to true or the variable setting will cause it to error given it is empty until the package is executed’

Thanks

item.title: By: chinmay

item.title: By: chinmay
